tika-s0303t9:1_0: 438-549. Mūlagandhādibhedaṁ gandhaṁ avanti apayuñjantīti gandhabbā, tesaṁ kāyo samūho
tika-s0303t9:1_1: gandhabbakāyo, gandhabbadevanikāyo. Cātumahārājikesu ekiyāva te daṭṭhabbā, tappariyāpannatāya
tika-s0303t9:1_2: tattha vā niyuttāti gandhabbakāyikā. Tesaṁ tesaṁ rukkhagacchalatānaṁ mūlaṁ paṭicca
tika-s0303t9:1_3: pavatto gandho mūlagandho, tasmiṁ mūlagandhe. Adhivatthāti mūlagandhaṁ adhiṭṭhāya,
tika-s0303t9:1_4: abhibhuyya vā vasantā. Esa nayo sesesupi. Taṁ nissāyāti taṁ mūlagandhaṁ rukkhaṁ paccayaṁ
tika-s0303t9:1_5: katvā nibbattā. Na kevalaṁ tattha gandho eva, mūlameva vā tesaṁ paccayoti dassento
tika-s0303t9:1_7: gandhānaṁ gandhasamudāye. Mūlādigandhānaṁ gandheti mūlādigataavayavagandhānaṁ gandhe,
tika-s0303t9:1_8: timūlādigatasamudāyabhūteti attho. Pubbe hi ‘‘mūlagandhe’’tiādinā rukkhānaṁ avayavagandho
tika-s0303t9:1_9: gahito, idha pana sabbaso gahitattā samudāyagandho veditabbo. Tenāha ‘‘yassa hi rukkhassā’’tiādi.
tika-s0303t9:1_10: Soti so sabbo mūlādigato gandho gandhasamudāyo idha gandhagandho nāma. Tassa gandhassa
tika-s0303t9:1_11: gandheti tassa samudāyagandhassa tathābhūte gandhe. Sarikkhaṁ sadisaṁ paṭidānaṁ etissāti
tika-s0303t9:1_12: sarikkhadānaṁ, patthanā. Yathādhippetaphalāni sarikkhadānattāva adhippetaphalaṁ dentu,
tika-s0303t9:1_13: asarikkhadānaṁ kathanti? Tampi detiyeva puññassa sabbakāmadadattāti āha ‘‘asarikkhadānampī’’tiādi.
